name: VHF Recipe & Meal Plan Ontology
description: Domain ontology for Viridian Nutrition Intelligence Platform covering recipes, meal plans, client health profiles, coaching relationships, thematic meal curation, and UK-specific nutrition requirements.

futureAlignment.note: To be aligned with PFC/PFI ontology patterns from Azlan-EA-AAA. DS-ONT for design system tokens also pending.

creator: Viridian Health & Fitness
